title: New OLED material breakthrough could mean cheaper OLED TVs
description: OLED TVs are a go-to for enthusiasts, but prices remain stubbornly high. Research coming out of a Korean university suggests that situation could be changing.

title: Master & Dynamic has overhauled its elite (and gorgeous) wireless headphones
description: All new technology, including improved drivers, comes to updated headphones with some classic style.

title: Ransomware gang LockBit claims to have stolen confidential SpaceX data
description: The data seems to have been stolen in a supply chain attack, but SpaceX is quiet for now.

title: Windows 11 could be stealth-nerfing graphics cards – even the RTX 4090
description: A security feature causing frame rate drops of up to 10%? There’s a lot to discuss here.

title: Intel Arc A750 GPU gets another price cut, which is amazing news for gamers
description: Intel has finally signed the RTX 3060’s death warrant with this latest price drop.

title: A cyberspy outfit is attacking high-level targets in the EU
description: Embassies, healthcare agencies and other critical orgs have been compromised.

title: The SVB collapse is being exploited by scammers
description: As chaos takes hold following collapse of Silicon Valley Bank favored by tech startups, cybercriminals are making hay.

title: PSVR 2 needs to change to outsell its predecessor
description: Sony seems confident that PSVR 2 could outsell its PS4 predecessor, but it needs to do itself some favors to get there.

title: There's a new Linux distro available for ethical hackers
description: Kali Linux has been updated with a new look for 2023, and it’s hoping to make defensive security more accessible.

title: SAP releases fixes for some serious flaws in its business software
description: Five critical flaws were addressed, together with numerous other vulnerabilities.

title: Apple is delaying employee bonuses in a cost-cutting drive
description: Apple is seriously streamlining its finances, but layoffs remain a “last resort” for the foreseeable.

title: Vodafone and Three merger talks to accelerate this month
description: Bloomberg reported that Vodafone and Three are expected to announce their merger in March this year.

title: Operators looking to employ CPE with intelligent services and applications for future growth
description: Smarter Customer Premise Equipment is essential for operators in order to secure new revenue and reverse declining ARPU rates, experts argue.

title: Global and mobile business broadband to benefit from 5G
description: 5G communication demand has seen a dramatic uptick in the days following this year's Mobile World Congress.

title: The NCSC warns of the dangers of ChatGPT
description: The UK’s National Cyber Security Centre has issued a warning about the dangers of AI chatbots.

title: Fitbit gives away some of its best Premium features for free – and it's about time
description: Fitbit will now allow you to see your 90-day breathing and heart rate data for free.

title: Microsoft's latest Patch Tuesday is here - fixes numerous flaws, some 'critical'
description: March Patch Tuesday addresses almost 90 vulnerabilities.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Flip 5 could be the most durable foldables yet
description: Samsung's lead on foldable durability looks set to get even bigger, if this latest leak turns out to be true.

title: RTX 4070 price and launch date leaks suggest Nvidia hasn't learned from past mistakes
description: Pricing for the RTX 4070 has leaked, and left us wondering if Nvidia is repeating it's comedy of RTX 4080 errors.

title: Windows 11 just got loads of new features including one that iPhone owners will love
description: As well as Phone Link for iOS, Microsoft has brought in improvements for touchscreen users, and more besides.

title: Russian hackers have been exploiting unknown flaw in Outlook for nearly a year now
description: A vulnerability in Outlook’s Windows clients has been exploited by Russian hackers for many months.

title: Fortinet flaws are being exploited in attacks on government
description: Attackers with "advanced capabilities" are exploiting FortiOS flaws in "highly targeted" events.

title: The 5 most exciting AI tools coming to Gmail, Google Docs, Sheets, and more
description: Google has announced several new AI tools coming soon to its suite of products, and we've picked out the top five most useful tools for you.

title: A ransomware gang claims it has breached Ring and is threatening to leak data
description: Attackers say they have compromised the camera maker, while owner Amazon says they haven't.

title: The Google Pixel 8 could be surprisingly small and quite curvy
description: Our first look at the Google Pixel 8 shows a more rounded design and a much smaller screen than the Pixel 7.

title: Arrested Development isn't leaving Netflix after all
description: Netflix has seemingly struck a last-minute deal to keep the hugely popular sitcom on its platform.

title: Infamous botnet turns to new file pumping tactic to attack users
description: Files of large sizes don't get scanned by antivirus programs, and hackers know it.

title: NordVPN's Meshnet is now free of charge
description: In one of its biggest revamps, NordVPN has made Meshnet free, added an advanced file-sharing option and open-sourced three of its products.

title: SMB customers to get free unlimited Spectrum Mobile service for one year
description: This offer is limited to one free Unlimited Mobile line per business customer.

title: Bullitt leading the phone space race
description: Text messages take around 10 seconds to send.

title: New Samsung Galaxy A54 and A34 offer more of what you want, but is it enough?
description: The new Samsung Galaxy A54 5G and A34 5G, offer nice camera and performance improvements, but a higher price in some markets too.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Wednesday, March 15 (game #415)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Latest leak suggests the Pixel Fold may not rival the Galaxy Z Fold 4
description: Google's latest first foldable phone may be as expensive as the Galaxy Z Fold 4 while lacking the strength.
